      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Player p)
        Compares this player with the specified player for order. Returns a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this player's score is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified player's score.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Player>
